q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
q2: With the amount of young talent and the disappointment of the 2018 world cup, I think they will be hungry for the next world cup.
a2: Germany will make changes for 2022 after their terrible 2018 world cup. However they deserved 2018 due to poor performances from players like Ozil and Neuer and the way they acted towards the Sweden bench after their match.
q3: Can Germany win it all next FIFA World Cup?
a3: Now that they replaced their old players, I think they will definitely play much better.
q4: Does Germany have the most WC wins?
a4: No, Brazil has more than Germany.
